prop_use_cache_tooltip: If checked, the scraper will save a local copy of the page to speed up subsequent runs on the same URL.
prop_fetch_only_html_tooltip: If checked, this module will only get the page's HTML content and output it to 'data.html_content', ignoring all extraction rules.
prop_interaction_steps_help: One action per line. Format: ACTION | SELECTOR | VALUE. Available actions: NAVIGATE, CLICK, TYPE, WAIT, EXTRACT. Example Selector: id=username or css_selector=button.submit
